p: The CO 2 trends were assumed to be the same across the continent (Figure 1a) and derived from (Prather et al., 2013). Figure 1b shows average temperature changes for rice in the main rice growing season, averaged over the growing seasons and sites used in this paper. Figure 2 shows spatial variability in projected temperature changes for T max in the most extreme scenario. Consistent with most climate change scenarios future relative humidity was assumed to remain unchanged. Possible changes in rainfall patterns were not simulated because uncertainty in future rainfall projections is too large (Giannini, Biasutti, Held, & Sobel, 2008; Lobell & Burke, 2008; Lobell et al., 2008).
